states

Class StateAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • states.StateAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WaitAnswer, WaitConfiguration, WaitScore

    public abstract class StateAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IState
    State Adapter. This class implements all possible state actions. Allowing states to only implement desired methods.

    • Field Summary

      protected Challenge challenge
      challenge variable represents the current challenge being played.

        public IState startGame(java.util.List<Challenge.Categories> categoryList)
        After challenge configurations are set, to start game use this method.
        Specified by:
        startGame in interface IState
        Parameters:
        categoryList - List of categories.
        Returns:
        WaitAnswer if configurations are correct. Returns this if there's invalid configurations.

      • quitGame

        public IState quitGame()
        If user wants to quit challenge this method should be called. No data is saved if this method is called.
        Specified by:
        quitGame in interface IState
        Returns:
        WaitConfiguration

      • nextAnswer

        public IState nextAnswer(Answer answer)
        Move to next answer.
        Specified by:
        nextAnswer in interface IState
        Parameters:
        answer - Represents the answer chosen by the user.
        Returns:
